name: API Versioning Example
description: Ejemplo completo de versionado de APIs con APIDoc v5
title: Products API - Multi Version Example

header.title: API Versioning Guide
header.content:
This example demonstrates proper API versioning in APIDoc v5. It shows how to manage multiple versions (v1.0.0 through v4.0.0) without duplicates or conflicts.

**Version History**:
- **v1.0.0**: Basic product information (id, name, price)
- **v2.0.0**: Added category support
- **v3.0.0**: Added inventory tracking (in_stock, quantity)
- **v4.0.0**: Added reviews and ratings system

**Two Approaches Demonstrated**:
1. OpenAPI files with different paths (v1-v3)
2. Native APIDoc annotations with same path (v4)

footer.title: Version Selection
footer.content: Use the version selector in the UI to switch between API versions and see the evolution of the Products API.
